com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.db

Class CachedDatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.db.CachedDatabaseHandler

  • public class CachedDatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler that wraps the database handler and provides caching for basic metadata retrieval calls.

                                                               java.sql.SQLException
        Initializes a CachedDatabaseHandler and returns it. A new handler is only created, if one has not yet been created for this (connection name, source type) pair that the enclosing nest defines, otherwise, the previously created handler is returned.
